'''15w39c''' is the twenty-eighth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on September 23, 2015<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2015/09/minecraft-snapshot-15w39a/</ref> to fix several bugs and improve performance.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Dispenser]]s'''
* Now equip [[pumpkin]]s and [[mob head]]s onto the heads of [[player]]s, [[mob]]s and [[armor stand]]s.

=== General ===
'''Performance'''
* [[Redstone]] and [[piston]] contraptions visibly update much faster.
* Better performance on older computers.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=15w39c|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|8199|Mob heads and pumpkins cannot be equipped by dispenser/through shift-click.
|44959|Zombie and skeleton horses don't count as undead.
|54120|Wrong creeper hitbox & eye Level.
|54615|Villagers' and skeletons' hitbox needs to be adjusted.
|;dev
|82835|Spamming ender pearls in creative temporarily loses them.
|83746|Framerate drop in 1.9 snapshots.
|86289|The statistics of shields will show "<code>item.shield.name</code>" instead of the "Shield".
|87411|Zombie villager leg has transparent pixels.
|88315|Consistent chunk updates after respawn.
|89302|Block lag.
}}</onlyinclude>
